name: Moving Forward (jakazamrose)
description:
IN DEVELOPMENT - NOT THE FINAL PRODUCT

Our foxy friend has a motto - always be moving forward. Unfortunately, they take this completely literally, and thus can never turn around or walk backwards.  One day they accidentally jump over the button that opens their house. Help our friend walk around the world to finally be able to get inside and get some sleep.

Controls:

D / Right arrow : Move right

Space : Jump

R : Respawn from checkpoint
